name: Corbin Presbyterian Church
description: Corbin Presbyterian Church is a faith-based community organization located in Corbin, Kentucky. They operate a food pantry that is led and staffed by church volunteers, normally open on Tuesdays from 9 a.m. until noon. The food pantry provides not only food assistance but also workshops to assist with real world functionality for participants. They work in partnership with Corbin United Effort and other local organizations to serve the community.
source: Verified from official Corbin Presbyterian Church website and search results
hours_of_operation: Food pantry: Tuesdays 9 AM - 12 PM. Worship: Sundays 11:00 AM
notes: Email: churchoffice@corbinpres.org. Administrative Assistant: Shelby Stanford. Pastor: Rev. Lisa Eye. Director of Music: Clay Howard. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CorbinPresby/. Fax: (606) 526-9065. Food pantry contact: Lisa Reeder. Call for current food pantry dates and times as they may vary.
